      • isValidDateStr

        public static boolean isValidDateStr(java.lang.String date,
                     java.lang.String format,
                     java.util.Locale locale)
        Checks if a date string conforms to a specific format for the given locale
        Parameters:
        date - a date string
        format - a date format string
        locale - the locale to use when interpreting the date string
        Returns:
        true if the date string conforms to the date format for the given locale, otherwise false
